basic_info.description:
I am Matthieu Lebreton and if you want to know more about me, you’re at the right place.
 	 I first started coding in a fablab a few years ago, decided to work on a personal project : an electronic voting web-based application. This drove me wanting to specialize and I started a formation to get a degree.  
 And there I am… at the dawn of my graduation.
 Specialized in Javascript, I would be honored to help you with your projects from the frontend creation with React to the backend with Nodejs .
 Do not hesitate to leave a message so you can tell me your needs and wants.

projects.title: Kasa
projects.description:
Kasa was my first React project. The purpose : retrieve data from a real property lease website to display those in clicable card. 
 Responsive website ; component logic ; fetch ; props ; hook were the project's key words.

projects.title: My old grimoire
projects.description:
My favorite project so far. The purpose was to create in collaboration with a frontend developer a book rating website. So I took care of creating the backend side of this project where I explored Express and MongoBD.
The authentication, the optimisation of all the pictures and the routing were the main key points of this work.
